forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow this morning changing to all rain for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
